Articles.Content: Wouldn't it be great if 1.0 contains all whole bucket-load of **new** easter-eggs? That would bring back some of the firsttimey-awesome-explory-newness from the days of old.
It would be cool, yes, but seems pretty unlikely.

possibly one, maybe two. but thats only a guess.

In my opinion i would love to see the magic boulder re-appear in the Kerbal Universe.

I'd love to see a type of "scavenger hunt" that leads you from place to place throughout the Kerbin system. I thought that the SSTV-transmitting hill on Duna was absolutely brilliant!!! and would love to see more of this type of "mind puzzles" that lead you from place to place. Stuff like this would bring in TONS of new players when the game goes live.

The Magic Boulder would indeed be a great thing to re-add. I came in late to the party, and never ever got to explore it. However, from the easter eggs I've seen, it has to be one of my favorites. Probably second-favorite compared to the dead Kraken.

I would like IVA easter eggs... Finding things in cabinets?

I regret to remind you that additional easter eggs is one of the topics that has been so talked to death that we've placed it on our [list of things not to suggest](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest) again. This doesn't mean that it can't happen. Just that there's nothing new to be said about it at the moment.
